record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 6041
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 6041 -- (House of Representatives - June 20, 2008)

[Page: H5774]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I seek unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H.R. 6041.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Texas?
